alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Shelby County through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Southeast Memphis, or near Germantown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Southeast Memphis, Ellendale, Elmore Park, Brunswick, Lenow, Fisherville, Raleigh, Parkway Village, White Station and Spring Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
